# Class RemoteLLMComponent

Remote LLM component for text generation services. This component provides access to external LLM providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, or Inworld. It handles authentication and default configuration for text generation.

#### Example


```
const llmComponent = new RemoteLLMComponent(&#123;  id: 'my-llm-component',  provider: 'openai',  modelName: 'gpt-4o-mini',  defaultConfig: &#123;    temperature: 0.7,    maxNewTokens: 1000  &#125;&#125;);

```


##### Index

constructor

### Methods

toGraphConfigComponent

  * toGraphConfigComponent(): [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

Converts the remote LLM component to a graph configuration component.

The configured a remote LLM component for graph execution

Overrides AbstractComponent.toGraphConfigComponent
